name: Netherguild (Early alpha demo)
description:
Welcome to Netherguild!

 A game about assembling an expedition deep into earth, exploring and bonding with your team members. Netherguild is also a turn based strategy-roguelite game in a fantasy world with no magic-


Currently, Netherguild is still in an early alpha stage- which means your feedback can have an immense impact on the final result. If you want to tell me what you enjoyed / didn't enjoy about Netherguild and be involved with its development, or play updates a bit earlier than on itch, you can join the Netherguild discord!

(But I also really appreciate comments on itch 👍)

Additionally, for more info you can check out Netherguild's site or follow it's development on social media:
-Site
-Twitter
-Instagram
-Reddit
-IndieDB

Hope you will have a great time exploring the underworld,

David Vinokurov
